question: India's first pneumococcal conjugate vaccine "Pneumosil" has been launched by which pharmaceutical company?
explanation:
Union Health Minister Harsh Vardhan recently inaugurated India's first pneumococcal conjugate vaccine "Pneumosil”.
The vaccine has been developed by the Serum Institute of India Private Limited (SIIPL) in collaboration with partners like the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation. This affordable vaccine has been licensed by Drugs Controller General (India) in the month of July.
